org.geeek.btce

Class BtceClientApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.geeek.btce.BtceClientApi

  • public class BtceClientApi
extends Object
    A Java Client for BTC-e V3 APIs.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ludovic Toinel
    See Also:
    "https://btc-e.com/api/3/documentation#info"

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Depth getDepth(Pair pair)
      This method provides information on active warrants pair.
      Map<String,PairInfo> getInfo()
      This method provides all the information about currently active pairs, such as the maximum number of digits after the decimal point in the auction, the minimum price, maximum price, minimum quantity purchase / sale, hidden whether the pair and the pair commission.
      Ticker getTicker(Pair pair)
      This method provides all the information about bidding on a pair, such as: the highest price, lowest price, average price, trading volume, trading volume in the currency of the last deal, the price of buying and selling.
      List<Trade> getTrades(Pair pair)
      This method provides information on the latest deals.
      private net.sf.json.JSONObject publicHTTPRequest(PublicMethod method, String arg)
      Execute an HTTP query on the BTC-e public API.

      • getTicker

        public Ticker getTicker(Pair pair)
                 throws BtceFunctionalException,
                        BtceTechnicalException
        This method provides all the information about bidding on a pair, such as: the highest price, lowest price, average price, trading volume, trading volume in the currency of the last deal, the price of buying and selling. All information is provided in the last 24 hours.
        Parameters:
        pair - The pair.
        Returns:
        The current ticker for this pair.
        Throws:
        BtceTechnicalException
        BtceFunctionalException
        IOException
        org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonParseException

      • getTrades

        public List<Trade> getTrades(Pair pair)
                      throws BtceFunctionalException,
                             BtceTechnicalException
        This method provides information on the latest deals. Optional further receives GET-parameter limit , which indicates how many transactions need to display (150 by default). Takes a value less than 2000.
        Parameters:
        pair - The pair.
        Returns:
        The trades for this pair.
        Throws:
        BtceTechnicalException
        BtceFunctionalException
        IOException
        org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonParseException

      • getDepth

        public Depth getDepth(Pair pair)
               throws BtceFunctionalException,
                      BtceTechnicalException
        This method provides information on active warrants pair. Additionally takes an optional parameter GET- limit , which indicates how many orders you want to display (default 150). Takes a value less than 2000.
        Parameters:
        pair - The pair.
        Returns:
        The depths for this pair.
        Throws:
        BtceFunctionalException
        BtceTechnicalException
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonParseException
        org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException
        IOException

      • getInfo

        public Map<String,PairInfo> getInfo()
                             throws BtceFunctionalException,
                                    BtceTechnicalException
        This method provides all the information about currently active pairs, such as the maximum number of digits after the decimal point in the auction, the minimum price, maximum price, minimum quantity purchase / sale, hidden whether the pair and the pair commission.
        Returns:
        the active pair information
        Throws:
        BtceFunctionalException
        BtceTechnicalException
